text: John Albert Kitzhaber (born March 5, 1947) is an American politician. In 2011, he became the Governor of Oregon. He was also Governor of Oregon from 1995 to 2003. On February 13, 2015, Kitzhaber resigned as governor due to some serious allegations against him. His resignation became effect on February 18 when Kate Brown succeeded him. On May 2, 2016, Kitzhaber announced his endorsement for Vermont Senator Bernie Sanders in his 2016 nomination for the Democratic nomination. ==References== ==Other websites== *Governor John Kitzhaber official Oregon government site Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Oregon Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Oregon state senators
title: John Kitzhaber
